Interface BytesIn<U>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ByteStringParser<Bytes<U>>, RandomDataInput, StreamingCommon<Bytes<U>>, StreamingDataInput<Bytes<U>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<U>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, ChunkedMappedBytes, CommonMappedBytes, EmbeddedBytes, GuardedNativeBytes, HexDumpBytes, MappedBytes, NativeBytes, NativeBytes.NativeSubBytes, OnHeapBytes, SingleMappedBytes, SubBytes, UncheckedBytes, UncheckedNativeBytes, VanillaBytes

    public interface BytesIn<U>
extends RandomDataInput, StreamingDataInput<Bytes<U>>, ByteStringParser<Bytes<U>>

      • addressForRead

        long addressForRead(long offset)
             throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                    BufferUnderflowException,
                    IllegalStateException
        Obtain the underlying addressForRead. This is for expert users only.
        Parameters:
        offset - within this buffer. addressForRead(start()) is the actual addressForRead of the first byte.
        Returns:
        the underlying addressForRead of the buffer
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying buffer is on the heap
        BufferUnderflowException - if the offset is before the start() or the after the capacity()
        IllegalStateException
